Topic.Title: Local Corp is an excellent company with only 0.5-times-reveneus and a lot of excellent offers

Message.Msg: URL Acquisition: Securing the right URL for your business is the first step in building an online presence that’s uniquely yours. Local Corp will in the Propel-Package ($249) and in the Ignite-Package ($99): Research and secure the URL that best fits your business, makes you memorable and sets you apart from your competition. Web Hosting: A reliable host for your sites with a 99.9% uptime guarantee will ensure they are live when your customers are looking. Local Corp will in the Propel-Package ($249) and in the Ignite-Package ($99): Set up and manage site hosting so you can focus on taking care of your new customers with no extra fees. Site Design: Your online presence is most effective when you have a site that looks good, works well and delivers important information about your business. Local Corp will in the Propel-Package ($249) and in the Ignite-Package ($99): • Design a complete site that is impactful and memorable for your customers • Make sure you beat the competition by making key business details like your: address, phone number and business hours easy to find by your customers . Content: The content of all your sites is critical role for helping your customers find you first. Local Corp will in the Propel-Package ($249) and in the Ignite-Package ($99): • Generate content that helps your site rank higher on search engines • Post custom tips, articles and pictures on your site on a monthly basis to keep your sites fresh and up-to-date Mobile: More and more, customers are searching for businesses while they’re on the go using their mobile phones and tablets. Local Corp will in the Propel-Package ($249) and in the Ignite-Package ($99): • Create a mobile site that is optimized for mobile phones that properly mirrors your business site • Establish a mobile web address that helps you rank higher when customers search using a phone or tablet
